column2: This is an appeal from the District Court of Kaluthara.

column3: The  Plaintiff Respondent  instituted this  action to  partition the  land

column2: called  Kongahawatta  alias  Mattan  Thottam.  The  Plaintiff  Respondent
presented the pedigree and the  list of shares and moved Court to partition
land.  The  preliminary  survey  was  done  and
(marked  as  Xl  and  X2)  submitted  to  Court depicting the  land  as  lots  A,

column1: B,  C,  D.  The parties admitted that lot D is a road and agreed to  exclude it
